Interface Locatable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Action, ActionBaseValue, AliasT, AlternativeAddition, AlternativeRemoval, AnnotatedT, Annotation, AnyChar, ArrayT, Attribute, Binding, BindingValue, BooleanT, CharCase, CharClass, CharLiteral, CharRange, CharSwitch, CharTerminal, ClassOrInterfaceT, ClassT, Comment, DerivedT, Element, EmptyListValue, EnumeratorT, EnumT, ErrorT, FloatT, FollowedBy, Formatting, FullProduction, FunctionOrMethodT, FunctionT, GenericActionValue, GenericNodeValue, GenericRecursionValue, GenericValue, GNode, Grammar, InstantiatedT, IntegerT, InterfaceT, InternalParameter, InternalT, LabelT, LineMarker, ListValue, Literal, MethodT, Module, ModuleDependency, ModuleImport, ModuleInstantiation, ModuleList, ModuleModification, ModuleName, Name, NamedParameter, Node, NodeMarker, NonTerminal, NotFollowedBy, NullLiteral, NullValue, NumberT, Option, OrderedChoice, PackageT, Parameter, ParameterizedT, ParserAction, ParseTreeNode, PartialProduction, PointerT, Pragma, Predicate, Production, ProductionOverride, ProperListValue, Quantification, Repetition, SemanticPredicate, Sequence, SequenceName, SourceIdentity, StringLiteral, StringMatch, StringValue, StructOrUnionT, StructT, Syntax, Syntax.Conditional, Syntax.ConditionalBlock, Syntax.Directive, Syntax.EOF, Syntax.Language, Syntax.Layout, Syntax.Text, Terminal, TextToken, Token, TokenValue, TupleT, Type, UnaryOperator, UnionT, UnitT, ValueElement, VariableT, VariantT, VoidedElement, VoidT, Wildcard, WrappedT

    public interface Locatable
    The interface to objects with a source location.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location getLocation()
      Get this object's location.
      boolean hasLocation()
      Determine whether this object has a location.
      void setLocation(Locatable locatable)
      Set this object's location to the specified locatable's location.
      void setLocation(Location location)
      Set this object's location.

    • Method Detail

      • hasLocation

        boolean hasLocation()
        Determine whether this object has a location.
        Returns:
        true if this object has a location.

      • getLocation

        Location getLocation()
        Get this object's location.
        Returns:
        This object's location or null if it does not have a location.

      • setLocation

        void setLocation(Location location)
        Set this object's location.
        Parameters:
        location - This object's location.

      • setLocation

        void setLocation(Locatable locatable)
        Set this object's location to the specified locatable's location.
        Parameters:
        locatable - The locatable object.
